casebody.data:
Harry Jay LEVIN and Levin Cyphers, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF OCEAN COUNTY BUSINESS ASSOCIATION, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Chuck Laing, James Everett, Peter Ferro, Glenn Van Pell, Steve Pollack, Lisa McComsey, Chris Rosati, Gerry Rodelli, Sheree Robinson, Paul Loseff, and Chad White, Members of the Board of Trustees, Ocean County Business Association Grievance Committee and Members of the Grievance Committee, Individually, Defendants. C-460 September Term 2017
080085 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 12, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003630-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
